title: 'What student organizations do you hold a leadership position in?' Is this an essay question? The word limit is 300. - Quora

response.answer_text: You can answer this in one word, “none” or several “chair of the committee to hang the president”, but it's not really an essay question. I can't see that there is anything to discuss or explain, the question is clearly written to elicit one simple answer, it's rubbish.
